page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT IN COLEHILL
page.content: FATHERS. We made a block graph at school to show how our fathers and mothers are employed.In our group of 57 children, we found out that 25 fathers are in the professional group.None of the fathers in our group are unemployed.The next smallest group of fathers are self-employed, 18 fathers have engineering jobs.We found out that there were only 9 fathers who were manual workers. MOTHERS. In a group of 56 children we found that 22 mothers are solely housewives and stay at home and 34 mums go out to work. {UNIT 3 HAYESWOOD C.FIRST SCHOOL. {
